titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Comoros
Comoros

div.head: Legislation
div.p: There is no official legislation governing access to diplomatic archives.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers should contact the Permanent Mission to the United Nations or the nearest Embassy of Comoros to inquire as to the feasibility of access to diplomatic records. Pre-independence records may also be found in French diplomatic archives.

p.ref: Permanent Mission to the United Nations
